name: Inequality Join
description: Performs a join between the first (left) and second (right) input. The join can be performed using equality/inequality comparators ==, <=, >=, <, > , which means the result will be a constraint cartesian join including all records that match the inequalities.
introductoryText:
![Inequality Join](data:image/png;base64,)

Performs a join between the first (left) and second (right) input. The join can be performed using equality/inequality comparators ==, <=, >=, <, > , which means the result will be a constraint cartesian join including all records that match the inequalities.
